for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role-- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google's CEO by co-founder Larry Page.

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.''
